DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective determine whether Visbiome improve 1 ) intestinal symptom Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS ) 2 ) non-intestinal symptom ( fatigue , joint pain , insomnia , general stiffness headache ) associate IBS . All symptom part Gulf War ( GW ) illness .
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aims : Aim # 1 : Determine efficacy Visbiome IBS symptom GW veteran . Hypothesis : Treatment Visbiome compare placebo improve global individual symptom IBS Aim # 2 Determine efficacy Visbiome reduce non-intestinal symptom IBS ( fatigue , joint pain , insomnia , general stiffness headache ) . Hypothesis : Treatment Visbiome compare placebo improve non-intestinal symptom IBS GW veteran . Aim # 3 Determine whether change gut flora plasma cytokine correlate treatment response GW veteran .
